CustomField.formula:
If(isblank( X5_Award_Committee_Approval__c ),".......................", "(5) " & If(len(text(Month(X5_Award_Committee_Approval__c))) = 1, "0" & text(Month( X5_Award_Committee_Approval__c)), text(Month( X5_Award_Committee_Approval__c))) & "/" & If (len(text(Day( X5_Award_Committee_Approval__c))) =1, "0" & text(Day( X5_Award_Committee_Approval__c)), text(Day(X5_Award_Committee_Approval__c))) & "/" & text(Year(X5_Award_Committee_Approval__c)))
&" " &
If(isblank( X6_Site_Control_Executed__c )," ......................", "(6) " & IF(len(text(Month( X6_Site_Control_Executed__c))) = 1, "0" & text(Month( X6_Site_Control_Executed__c)), text(Month( X6_Site_Control_Executed__c))) & "/" & If (len(text(Day( X6_Site_Control_Executed__c))) =1, "0" & text(Day( X6_Site_Control_Executed__c)), text(Day( X6_Site_Control_Executed__c))) & "/" & text(Year( X6_Site_Control_Executed__c)))
CustomField.label: zzArc(5) Approved ........(6) Site Cntrl
